snippet.title: BioBeasts Gameplay!
snippet.description:
WHAT’S NEW IN RELEASE 1.5.0:
* 22 new Mutations
* Equippable Mutations
* Customize the look of each Beast with new skins
* Mutation Crate system
* Loads of interface improvements
* New Nuclear Bundle package with 10k BioBits, exclusive skin, and Nuclear Crate

Escape, Mutate, and Destroy! Take control of powerful mutant beasts and battle through waves of merciless robots, laboratory defenses, and hulking bosses. Claw, bite, blast, and mutate your way to freedom while freeing new beasts with unique monster powers! Unlock and upgrade powerful Mutations to customize your beasts, crafting your own strategy for escape!

FEATURES
* Activate incredible Beast Powers to devastate your mechanical foes!
* Unlock unique beasts and rampage to freedom!
* Customize your beasts with new skins and over 50 powerful Mutations! 
* Master 4 difficulty modes!
* Shred 20+ unique robotic enemy types including a vicious final boss!
* Survive 9 merciless waves!
* Conquer endless challenges to test your skill!
* Dominate online leaderboards! 
* Take the fight anywhere with multiplatform Cloud Saving!

BioBeasts Support:
http://biobeasts.artix.com/help/

Follow @BioBeasts on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/BioBeasts

Become a fan of BioBeasts on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/BioBeasts/ 

Stay up to date with the latest BioBeasts news by following our development blog: 
http://biobeasts.artix.com/

BioBeasts is created by the friendly and creative team behind Artix Entertainment's PvP hit, EpicDuel!

Become a fan of BioBeasts on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/BioBeasts/ 

Stay up to date with the latest BioBeasts news by following our development blog: 
http://biobeasts.artix.com/

BioBeasts is created by the friendly and creative team behind Artix Entertainment's PvP hit, EpicDuel!
